title: #116 Danny & #RHOBH's Teddi Mellencamp
itunes:title: #116 Danny & #RHOBH's Teddi Mellencamp
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Teddi Mellencamp back to the show to discuss the explosive season of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. They talk dog-drama, Denise Richards joining the cast, filming rumors, Jessica Simpson sampling her dad's music, and so much ...
description:
Danny welcomes Teddi Mellencamp back to the show to discuss the explosive season of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. They talk dog-drama, Denise Richards joining the cast, filming rumors, Jessica Simpson sampling her dad's music, and so much more.


Teddi: 3:30ish


*To support the pod & for bonus eps, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
